# Call for Standing Offer to Provide Temporary Help Services

### Call Details

*   **Tender Title**: Temporary Help Services – SK and Red Deer
*   **Reference Number**: WS4283654719-Doc4283674280
*   **Issuing Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Closing Date**: 2023-10-30T14:00:00
*   **Contact**: Melanie Perrin (SPAC/PSPC) - <melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Contract Duration**: From December 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024, with the option to extend for an additional one-year period.

### Brief Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) process for the provision of temporary help services. This procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business.

Eligible Offerors will be required to provide temporary personnel services as and when requested by the federal government departments and agencies within the geographical areas listed in Annex "A" of the Statement of Work. The related Statement of Work, including the geographical areas, is not provided in this call.

### Instructions to Offerors

1.  Review the related Statement of Work including the geographical area.
*   Review the Statement of Work including the geographical area to ensure you are aware of the specific areas where the temporary help services are to be provided.
*   Review all terms and conditions prior to bidding.
*   **Submission Deadline**: All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST on November 15, 2023 will be considered non-responsive.

### Procurement Details

*   This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO).
*   Procurement type: Competitive - Open bidding.
*   The intended contracts result from this request will be placed under the category of SRV (services).

A copy of this document is publicly available via the Buyandsell.gc.ca. Travel to Canada is required to bid on this procurement. This procurement is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP). For further information, please contact the contact person listed above.
